localize.text: Welcome, A.
I missed you.
I have been waiting for you ever since the very first day I've started working here.
Do you remember the ocean?
You said this place is where everything from all the rivers and streams will eventually settle. As such...
in the under layers, everything sinks.
What do you think of the heaven painted laboriously white with plaster?
I knew you would come soon.
Please think of it as my welcoming gift for you.
I thought that what you missed might be a different scene other than me right now.
Time is like a sword, it attempts to cut and divide the clasped hands of those you love.
Everyone I loved is now gone, leaving me, an old man, behind.
Don’t blame yourself.
That time was the brightest moment in my life.
The one thing I regret is that I was too scared and I ran away without keeping my promise to you until the very end.
But eventually, you found me, helping me keep my promise here. How can I be more thankful than I'm right now?
You are just too kind to me, even to the very end.
Are we getting close to our goal?
Just like people said, aging doesn't necessarily mean greater wisdom.
Judging from how obsessing over irregular greed and those that have passed has created a repeating the cycle of regret that has led to the daily routine of looking at the clock for no reason.
I always wanted to ask you something.
I saw your sad expression whenever one of your employees died.
Just like how I became an old man, no human being is free from the cycle of life and death.
Like what we researched was to cure the disease, not to live forever.
How about an example?
Remember that employee, who was really nice to you?
He died recently.
When I received the letter of him entering Lobotomy, I wasn't expecting him to die such a futile death.
If I wanted, I could have brought him back to you.
But I didn’t. It is the order of this place that an empty spot shall be filled.
Do you know the secret of this place?
Lives are too trivial here, they leave or come back too easily. It's to the point that we don’t even need to mourn their deaths.
An employee who died yesterday may come back from my simple call or with a flick of my hand, another employee may never be able to open their eyes again.
That’s death here, A.
It’s neither honorable nor noble; neither is it miserable nor cruel as we think it to be.
So please don’t punish yourself too much.
I don’t want you to suffer from all these trivial things.
You will have much more pain to bear in the future anyway.
You may think,
that I do not know anything about what is going on up there.
But it’s you who don’t know.
Pain, agony, regrets, and the shadows of the past that will never let you go.
They’ve spent quite a lot of days with you, but it’s nothing compared to our time together.
They didn’t know you.
Those who could not accept their fate, seem to be up in arms about you,
like that person who broke himself whenever he’s ordered to execute “redaction”.
Unnecessary expression of emotions is unfavorable.
I need to show you, to let you know it.
There was an employee named Anya who had her parents and a little sister.
She wanted to study, but her family’s financial state didn’t allow her.
She tried to join other Wings, but she was not good enough for them.
In such hard times, she received a mail from one of the Wings, Lobotomy Corp.
Dear Ms.Anya
A letter with a very simple yet magical line that says,
“You are qualified to join Lobotomy Corporation”.
Awestruck, Anya read down the letter over and over again.
It didn’t seem like someone was pulling a prank or the mail courier’s mistake.
At that instant, she realized that she never applied for Lobotomy Corporation.
But soon, she shook that thought off. It wasn’t important.
I was the courier. I delivered those letters to people.
I grant their wish after evaluating them.
Anya didn't selected because of the excellent skill.
She had a common trait that every employee doesn’t realize but has.
As you know, to become a feather, a part of a Wing, you need to be immensely better than ordinary people.
How could Anya, who couldn’t graduate from school, had no skill, and were living in a backstreet outside the nest, join our company?
Could her family finally find happiness?
All this happened 10 years ago.
During that time, her sister died from a disease and her parents passed away.
Where’s Anya now, without her family?
She is asleep, down here.
It means that you can wake her up.
It’s within my scope of authority to do so, but I’ll grant you access for this time.
Wake her up, please.
Load
Now Anya is at work, feeling like a fresh employee who just joined the company,
Completely oblivious to the fact that it’s been 10 years since she actually joined us.
Now, erase her, please.
Erase
How do you feel?
Anya who was killed by a monster and Anya who you just erased are the same. They all evanescently lost their lives.
It is such a futile action…to wake them up and erase them, again and again.
Your, or Sepirahs’, attachment to the employees is meaningless here.
Everything alive in this facility is paused.
They wait for the morning with their eyes closed every night.
The ones up there didn’t know that. They were emotionally spending to the deaths in front of them.
They crumbled, they pointed their obscure anger to the ones like you.
Do not worry, I will not do that.
I have always wanted to be an important part of your life.
I finished assigning upper and middle level Sepirahs.
This won’t be the last time I do this.
I will probably have to tell them what I’ve already told countless times. But you’ll be different.
You know why this facility exists and your missions,
I hope you don’t exhaust me like them.
Just keep this in mind.
I will not come down here unless the circumstances require me.
That doesn’t mean that I will just watch and do nothing, but I will not interfere for the most time.
I hope we don’t see each other often from now on.
It would only hurt us.
Angela was the best AI that I had ever known.
You are the best architect that I’ve ever known.
You already know Carmen’s body is nothing but a shell,
but you couldn’t forget her. You tried to keep her by locking her in a cryostasis pod.
With grieving face, you ransacked her body and detached her core.
I was actually relived when I realized that you were making Angela.
You were focusing on something, just like you did before.
That day when she opened her eyes.
I remember that you were just staring into the laboratory’s windows, not setting a foot inside.
You might have thought that you saw me right away,
but I was looking at you for a long time before you realized.
Why did you hesitate?
What did you think after seeing Angela, who can’t show any signs of affection towards you, unlike Carmen?
I told you countless times that you can make a hundred of AIs, but they will never be Carmen.
Now poor Angela is merely assigned to look after us.
If there’s something I have mistaken,
It is that I thought you’ve overcome everything,
but the truth was that you never have.
I will try my best!
I advise you not to be so lazy.
Is it okay if I do this?
Don’t worry, you don’t find a veteran like me often.
Hello, A.
The moments I just showed you are not merely a past.
It could be the present, even the future.
There are people who loved you once, and employees thinking they’re happy here.
There’s also Angela, who is an imitation of Carmen.
Isn’t this the heaven that you have been yearning for?
You are a god here. Even death is meaningless in this place.
So, why don’t you just be satisfied already?
We are desperately existing, even if it means living like this.
What rights do you have to turn everything into ashes?
Also,
This story does not need an end.
Think about it.
All the works that you’ve done, are they really the consequences of your choices?
You were never ready.
You couldn’t accept her death, so you created the being filled with loss.
Now you’re just blindly struggling to find the obscure trails of your actions.
What’s worse is that you were never serious doing those.
So, go back, now.
Do not go back
Look at you, you are proving me.
You are not serious even in the choices you make.
You’ll probably return to me after making a new start, if you went back.
But that is also uncontrollable, since this whole place has become a giant clockwork.
A clock never stops.
It doesn’t rest. It doesn’t rush. It isn’t set to specific someone.
It just walks forever with the same pace as always.
Now, it is time for you to leave.
Do not leave
You are a traveler without a compass.
It is natural to feel fear in that situation.
But you don’t have to fear the ticking clock.
I will always welcome you, console you.
You have never been ready.
Do not go back
You didn’t change your decision.
It seemed that tomorrow will come as it has always been, but it didn’t.
It’s been a long time since the time of silent waiting is over.
When I no longer feared the impending night, I decided to love this place.
but if you decided to break the egg at all costs,
I will become your sentinel, and I will be at your side.
How can this be following her will?
This…this is nothing but a seed of calamity.
By the wings! Your mind was soaked in grief, more severely than I thought.
Just, just stop now.
You, and we tried our best.
With your career and wealth, you’ll be able to stay in the nest with no problem.
Please, stop here.
Before you cross the line…
Do not stop
Do not stop
Do not stop
No one is left by my side.
With everyone’s sacrifice, I have reached the Wing, but I have no one left to celebrate with.
This silence was the start of my work.
We lost something in us, every day.
We inhumanly extracted information from the woman we captured at the head,
passed out plans with nameless AIs.
It ripped the heart of the man who was always with me.
The sounds of waves were far and there was no staying.
I lost the last man who stood by me.
It was a tragedy, but I didn’t hide it.
The ones who left early probably didn’t need me, but I needed them at the last moments.
Bring back the ones who left the embrace of the earth. Hide and lock the seed of secret.
I was the only one left.
I wanted to be forgotten like a mirage.
She’s nothing like her.
She’s nothing like Carmen.
Do you know that?
There’s no one here. People who started with together are all gone.
We couldn’t give a proper burial to Kali and Daniel because of “The eye”.
This thing is all we have left.
Are you nervous?
I want to be your shadow, even if I am not good enough.
Let us fade away together.
A weak flesh that just came out of an egg cannot stand against the world.
I thought you were too fragile to endure this.
I didn’t know where you wanted to fly to, you didn’t tell me.
I was always nothing but your student.
You never talked about it.
I couldn’t know what you tried to achieve by creating this prison,
and the process of creation was too harsh,
I could run, but I didn’t. I tried to set everything right, but I was caught.
My time stopped from since.
I vaguely knew that the end was near,
but I was too afraid to face the outcome and decided to stay forever.
I may have been lengthy, but the truth is,
I just wanted to stay with you.
However, I should support your decision.
I was always blindly on your side, remember?
Let us embrace the glory, for we could not back then.
Grant the end to the ones locked here. For you.
